status_history: here is the status change history of project in numbering order(1):billing completed by Neil Hauck (2):offer submitted by Neil Hauck

scope_of_work.notes:
1. Does not include any client contingency 
2. Assumes that CBRE hold the burden of the actual cost whether it is over or under the quotation value 
3. Maintenance contract budget variations as a result of project activity will be funded by client through the eBVO process
scope_of_work.problem:
The DRUPS Engine Starter Batteries on the 4x NHB DRUPS are over 2.5 years old.

The battery replacement process is initiated when the batteries are older than 2.5 years to allow them to be replaced at the next scheduled Maintenance visit at no additional labour cost.
scope_of_work.scope: Replacement of six (6) Engine Starter Batteries on each of the four (4) DRUPS units at North Harbour, Portsmouth during the next scheduled Maintenance visit (Oct 2023).
scope_of_work.justification: Hitec Power Protection (DRUPS OEM) recommends the DRUPS Engine Starter Batteries are proactively replaced at three (3) year intervals to maintain the fast start required of the diesel in the event of utility failure.
scope_of_work.non_approval_effect:
Increased risk of the DRUPS units not fast starting in the event of utility failure.

Increased risk to the critical IT Load.

scope_of_work.scope: Replacement of Six Engine Starter Batteries on each of the two DRUPS units at Kyndryl Warwick.

project_name: UPM-SCA3 has a failed controller and will no longer function
status_history: here is the status change history of project in numbering order(1):billing completed by Alayna Beatty (2):offer submitted by Alayna Beatty

scope_of_work.notes:
1. Does not include any client contingency 
2. Assumes that CBRE hold the burden of the actual cost whether it is over or under the quotation value 
3. Maintenance contract budget variations as a result of project activity will be funded by client through the eBVO process
scope_of_work.problem: SCA3 has a failed controller and will no longer function.
scope_of_work.scope: Replace the failed controller in SCA3. Restore previous parameters and settings and restore to full automatic operation.
scope_of_work.justification: SCA3 is 1 of 2 coolers that are required to cool a Plant Room containing an 11kV Transformer and HV switchgear. If the 2nd cooler were to fail, the Transformer would be at risk of overheating and subsequently impact site IT Load resilience (supply to Socomec UPS).
scope_of_work.non_approval_effect: Increased risk of impact to site IT Load. Increased electrical and fire hazard due to potential overheating of an 11kV Transformer.

scope_of_work.problem: Boiler pressurisation unit  was installed in 2009 when the boilers were installed. This unit has developed fault and stopped working. Pump and controller failure on the unit preventing the building heating system from functioning.
scope_of_work.scope: Supply, deliver and install x1 BOSS PF2-5E CABINET PRESSFILL 2PUMP 5BAR 1PH MICRO ENH CTRL
scope_of_work.justification: Cooler/colder ambient temperature will lead to no heating in the building which could lead to hyperthermia to staff and also freezing of the pipework and failure to the water system around site.
scope_of_work.non_approval_effect: Cooler/colder ambient temperature will lead to no heating in the building which could lead to hyperthermia to staff and also freezing of the pipework and failure to the water system around site.

status_history: here is the status change history of project in numbering order(1):billing completed by Neil Hauck (2):offer submitted by Neil Hauck

scope_of_work.notes:
1. Does not include any client contingency 
2. Assumes that CBRE hold the burden of the actual cost whether it is over or under the quotation value 
3. Maintenance contract budget variations as a result of project activity will be funded by client through the eBVO process
scope_of_work.problem: The LT circuit on Gen1 radiator has developed a major leak rendering the Generator offline. This reduces the NHB Standby Generator system to N.
scope_of_work.scope:
Specialist contractor to attend site to fit 'spade' blanks to the faulty section of the LT circuit on Gen1 radiator. This should restore the LT circuit to @66% capacity and enable the Generator to be restored to AUTO availability and restore the NHB Standby Generator system to N+1.

NOTE: there is some risk associated with this proposal as the pressure in the remaining LT radiator is likely to increase, however, this remains CBRE’s recommended Plan A. Plan B is to reconfigure the HV Control logic to commit with only 1x Generator available and this option is also being progressed.
scope_of_work.justification: To urgently restore the NHB Standby Generator system to N+1.
scope_of_work.non_approval_effect: Continued reduction of the NHB Standby Generator system to N.
